title: register new user with valid and invalid data
description: Test the user registration endpoint /api/v1/auth/register to ensure it returns 201 status for valid input data and 400 status for invalid input data.

title: user login with valid and invalid credentials
description: Test the user login endpoint /api/v1/auth/login to verify it returns 200 status for valid credentials and 401 status for invalid credentials.

title: get current user information with and without authentication
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/auth/me to confirm it returns 200 status with user information when authenticated and 401 status when unauthorized.

title: create trading strategy with valid and invalid inputs
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/trading/strategies/ POST method to ensure it creates a trading strategy with valid inputs returning 201 status and returns 400 status for invalid inputs.

title: list all trading strategies
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/trading/strategies/ GET method to verify it returns a 200 status with a list of trading strategies.

title: execute trade with valid and invalid trade data
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/trading/trades/ POST method to ensure it executes a trade with valid data returning 201 status and returns 400 status for invalid trade data.

title: get machine learning prediction with valid and invalid inputs
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/ml/predict POST method to verify it returns 200 status with prediction results for valid inputs and 400 status for invalid inputs.

title: get machine learning model performance metrics
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/ml/performance GET method to confirm it returns 200 status with ML model performance metrics.

title: get market data for existing and non-existing symbol
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/market/data/{symbol} GET method to ensure it returns 200 status with market data for existing symbols and 404 status for non-existing symbols.

title: get historical market data with valid symbol and period
description: Test the endpoint /api/v1/market/historical GET method to verify it returns 200 status with historical market data for valid symbol and optional period parameter.
